name: Super Sushi Sub (Sebulbion)
description:
Play as a submarine tasked with cutting seaweed for a sushi company. Use your bladed wings to cut through the seaweed but be careful not to crash into the different obstacles around the map.

This student game was created as part of a one week prototype by: Ann Helen Lorentsen, Jack Mair, Madeleine Day, Melinda Tulleners and Sebastian Tengdahl.
